title: Ready, set, play: Party Rewards are back!

replies.body:
so many negative comments on this article D:
anyways, **Thanks Riot for the party rewards ^_^**
I think it is because they are using the Teambuilder picture for this when they removed it much to the dismay of us who enjoyed Teambuilder.
I'm glad TeamBuilder was replaced. New system much better. It needs a few tweaks but overall I love it!
There are reasons I liked Team Builder... There are reasons I like the new version. Why can't we have both?
Because Riot giveth, and Riot taketh away
Because the 20 minute Q's will turn into 40 minute Q's from too many modes and not enough focus on a single mode.
its nice but i constantly find myself getting the role i didnt want to play even though i wouldve been fine waiting the 5-10 minutes to get my prefered role
add me please :D
whats your summoner name?
oh dear lord i hope you are trolling by saying that. if you are being serious... i think you should look for an exit.
If that isn't a joke he won't be able to find the exit.

What about people who enjoy playing solo more than with a party? During the Pool Party event I tried playing in a 5-man group made up of random people from in-client chat rooms, but the MMR was so messed up I had the worst time of my life, I won like 5 games out of 30 and people were still jerks so it didn't help with reducing toxicity. Please, stop giving larger bonuses only to groups, many people enjoy only playing solo.
You're going to love hextech crafting

"Earn Party Rewards all week long!"

So 4 days is now a week and since most people actually sleep by the time most people notice it will be 3...
4 days 14 hours

Awesome! Exactly during my exam week -.-
Why do these events always happen in the few days I cannot play D:{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
so let me get this straight. you give bonus exp for playing the new ques...and then disable the new ques. wp rito wp
If you hover over "rewards" in game, it only says 300% for five people, not 450%.

I know this is going to be downvoted forever, but Limited Edition skin owners are still waiting for that survey Hippalus promised 2 years ago.

And we're still waiting for proper compensation -- a tiered icon and an in-game emote when using those skins would be more than enough.

Come on Riot, keep your promises!
this would be totally neat if the new champion select queues weren't DISABLED. seriously, can we extend this since you basically removed the bonus the moment it went live?
YEAH! A WEEK OF EXTRA POIN- Wait what? What was that Jimmy? The Dynamic Queue is down?! Why, Jimmy? It CRASHED!?!? But what about the 450% IP? NOT AVAILABLE? NOOOOOOOOOO!!!!
I don't have friends
Friend the best people on your team.

My word, look at all these people going off about how unhelpful all this extra IP is. Perhaps the other summoners didn't think about how this helps out others who wish to unlock more champions. Surprise, surprise, long-time summoners, other people don't have all the IP in the world!

Thanks anyway Riot for giving those who need it some of that precious IP!
IF ONLY THERE WAS S&^* TO BUY WITH IP, RIOT.
considering a majority of the playerbase doesnt even have all runes+full rune pages (not to mention champs), there's plenty to buy for them >.>
+1 I've been playing since Season 2 and I still have 65 champs to unlock, not to mention all the runes/runepages I'm missing.

I've been playing since Season 3 and I have 14 champs (15 if you include Jhin) left to unlock and 12 rune pages with all the useful runes. I bought 2 champion bundles (the Gnar and Kindred ones) and haven't bought any IP boosts or champions with RP. What have you been doing with the IP? Maybe you just don't play enough.

Some of us leave for months or longer at a time only to feel ourselves drawn back into the game. I joined league and played casually during S2, I tried ranked during S3, hated the community for the rampant abuse during S3, left before S4, stayed away for all of S4, returned shortly after S5 started, and quit for a month after leaving a ranked queue not because I had last pick and needed to support but because I picked a legitimate support and my ADC promised to AFK for the entire game because they hated my champion.
Any silver Players wanna Q up?
yessss

http://pasteboard.co/WtIHw7z.png


The values are different in the client. What's up with that?
shhh we weren't supposed to know that rito was actually trying to trick us
Nice, more IP for me to collect until you give us something to spend it on. Thanks guys!
You beat me to this. I have all champs and runes. I wish we could gift champions with IP. Get my duo mates caught up on champion collection.
Well, Jhin should be coming out ~~soon~~ sometime this year, so something to shoot for?
you can always send me some Ip
if only {{champion:32}}

I think they're going to give a new IP sink with the Hextech Crafting system.  My guess is they'll let you turn IP into champion/cosmic essence, though they'll make the ratio absurd so most people won't want to do it (like 100 IP for 1 essence.)
I'm pretty sure they already confirmed that the crafting system won't be an IP sink.
But then wat to spend my IP on...:-( Tired of changing my name just cuz theres nothing else to spend it on lol

*creates new team builder queues with super ip bonus for the weekend*
*takes new team builder down for the weekend*
Can you atleast extend the ip bonus for as many days as the new team builder queues are down?

so is there gunna be and extension due to the fact the new Q's are down?
?
if only i had friends {{champion:32}}

First game of the new season. Excited I won't get forced into a role I don't want to play :D 

Queue up... game stuck in champ select... 
no biggie, I just relaunch... still excited :D
Queue up again! - No penalties, this is a great sign!

... Old champ select... bummer...
forced to go support... bummer...
adc yasuo... doesn't go bot lane...
50 min of trolling...

#feelsbadman

**Rito, please stop trolling us!** You announced bônus and turn it off. Last day of kick off sale and we don't have bônus from new dynamics queue. Also I'm not getting ip as my friends do. Always less. Stop trolling Rito!
But but, i have no friends. why do you reward those who have been already rewarded with friendship. {{item:3070}}
Yay! 450% in new queues! Too bad there down all the time.
Hard to use these party rewards when their servers are broken.
